Hi Rich,

 

Rather than Bumu, I think Bu E ju or Bushu Edo ju using a shorthand. Date is
correct.

 

Gordon

 

-----Original Message-----
From: Richard Turner [mailto:ikkanshi@...] 
Sent: Wednesday, December 03, 2003 10:20 AM
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [nihontostudy] mei translation

 

all, I was tranlating this mei and nengo for someone on my board

http://www.image-hosting.net/images/messageboard/retalt/16.jpg

http://www.image-hosting.net/images/messageboard/retalt/15.jpg

I believe the mei reads Bumi Ju Kunimasa. I am unable to confirm the first
two characters but thought it referred to an Edo smith that also signed
Bushu Edo. The date I read as 8th month of the 6th year of Ansei 1854
so..August 1859. 

thoughts ?

cheers

Rich
